summary: REQ-7 asks to retry deployment of the current revision with no feature changes and confirm success (or provide full logs if it fails). The diff instead introduces substantive backend/frontend feature code changes and only adds a partial deployment guide; it does not provide evidence that an actual deployment retry was executed or that it succeeded/failed with captured logs.

missing_requirements.requirement: Execute a deployment attempt for the current app revision (same code as last attempted deploy) and confirm it completes successfully (or, if it fails, capture and surface full build+deploy logs).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff contains documentation and code changes, but no evidence of an actual deployment attempt, no confirmation of a successful deploy, no confirmation that the deployed frontend loads and reaches the backend canister, and no surfaced build/deploy logs for a retry attempt. Additionally, the backend/frontend code appears to have changed, conflicting with the requirement to deploy the same revision without feature changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend user profile management APIs (getCallerUserProfile, getUserProfile, saveCallerUserProfile) with authorization checks.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; REQ-7 explicitly states retry deployment without introducing new feature changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend property listing/CRUD functionality (types Property/PropertyInput, listProperties, getProperty, createProperty, updateProperty, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested and violates the constraint to not implement new backend features during deployment retry.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend admin management endpoints (grantAdmin, revokeAdmin) and related access-control mixing.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals explicitly mention not changing backend admin system behavior; also not part of a deployment retry-only request.

hallucinated_features.description: Frontend property/admin UI and hooks changes (TanStack Router pages, property CRUD hooks, ExternalBlob video handling, admin status query hooks, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested and violates the constraint to not implement new frontend features as part of this deployment retry.
